abstract: Federal hate crime charges are announced against Dylann Roof, gunman in massacre at Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC; Atty Gen Loretta E Lynch says Roof, who had already been charged with nine counts of murder, plotted attack for months and chose target because it was historically black church.
lead_paragraph: Dylann Roof, who already faces murder charges in state court, was indicted on federal hate crime charges, in the shootings deaths of nine black parishioners at Emanuel A.M.E. Church.

headline.main: Dylann Roof, Charleston Shooting Suspect, Is Indicted on Federal Hate Crime Charges
headline.print_headline: Nine Killings in Charleston Bring Charges of Hate Crime

snippet: Dylann Roof, who already faces murder charges in state court, was indicted on federal hate crime charges, in the shootings deaths of nine black parishioners at Emanuel A.M.E. Church.

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
keywords.name: organizations
